content: रासः {@--1@} An uproar, a din, confused noise. {@--2@} A sound in general. {@--3@} Speech. {@--4@} A kind of dance practised by Kṛṣṇa and the cowherds but particularly the {%gopis%} or cowherdesses of Vṛndāvana; उत्सृज्य रासे रसं गच्छंतीं <ls>Ve. 1. 2</ls>; रासे हरिमिह विहितविलासं स्मरति मनो मम कृतपरिहासं <ls>Gīt. 2</ls>; also <ls>Gīt. 1.</ls> {@--5@} A chain.
